org.apache.mahout.classifier.df.mapreduce.inmem

Class InMemBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.mahout.classifier.df.mapreduce.Builder
      • org.apache.mahout.classifier.df.mapreduce.inmem.InMemBuilder

  • public class InMemBuilder
extends Builder
    MapReduce implementation where each mapper loads a full copy of the data in-memory. The forest trees are splitted across all the mappers

    • Constructor Summary
